titleStmt.title: Description of Bryn Mawr College Libraries BV 201: Dalāʼil al-khayrāt wa shawāriq al-anwār fī dhikr al-ṣalāh ʻalá al-nabī al-mukhtār.

msContents.summary: Small, lacunose copy of the prayer book with the text in a circular border; pages missing at the end with one loose bifolium laid in at the back.

msItem.title: Dalāʼil al-khayrāt wa shawāriq al-anwār fī dhikr al-ṣalāh ʻalá al-nabī al-mukhtār.
[دلائل الخيرات و شوارق الانوار في ذكر الصلوة على النبي المختار]
[Dalāʼil al-khayrāt wa shawāriq al-anwār fī dhikr al-ṣalāh ʻalá al-nabī al-mukhtār].

supportDesc.extent: 76 foliated leaves, 3 unfoliated leaves : 80 x 80 (67 x 63) mm bound to 80 x 92 mm
supportDesc.foliation: Modern foliation added in pencil, upper left recto; catchwords each verso, lower left.

scriptDesc.scriptNote: Written in maghribī in brown ink; pointed, vocalized.

decoDesc.decoNote: Illuminated titles in blue, red, yellow (f. 1v, 17r, 37v); red, yellow, and blue triangle-shaped border decorations (f. 22r-23v), red, circular border-rule (f. 1v-38v, 3 unnumbered leaves at the back); rubrications in red, yellow, blue.

binding.p: Brown leather over pasteboard with flap (Type II); blind stamped covers with lighter brown, stamped paper onlay on both covers and flap. Carrying case in brownish red leather with red embroidery and tassels.

origin.p: Item is undated; perhaps copied in North Africa in the 18th century.

surface.n: Inside back cover flap open to show design
Back cover flap opened to show design
Fore edge flap closed, inside front cover
